import { memo, useState, useEffect } from 'react' import { english, vietnamese } from '../../Languages/EditProfile' import axios from 'axios' import City from '../../Data/city.json' import './EditProfile.scss' function EditProfile({ languageSelected, isDisabled }) { const languageList = languageSelected === 'EN' ? english : vietnamese return (
) } export default memo(EditProfile)
